name: Cancel Pending Discharge
description: Cancellation notification when a previously sent A16 (pending discharge) event needs to be reversed
businessPurpose: Cancel a previous pending discharge notification due to erroneous entry or decision to continue patient care
timing: Sent immediately after determining that a previous A16 pending discharge event should be cancelled
realWorldScenarios: Patient condition deteriorates - discharge cancelled for continued treatment
Pending discharge entered in error - patient still requires inpatient care
Family unable to provide adequate home care - discharge postponed
Post-discharge placement falls through - patient must remain in facility
Clinical team decides extended observation needed after discharge planning
Insurance authorization issues prevent planned discharge timing

generationRules.originalTrigger: References original A16 that is being cancelled
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - discharge cancellation affects care planning, bed management, and resource allocation
